Text: RE price indicationsCalvin Original Message From SMTP Sent Monday February PM To Subject price indications Just to let you know a year offer for Malin out of April is approximately and for PGE is about I will continue to watch this for you and will let you know periodically via email what I am seeing On another note I will be joining Laird and Stewart in your offices on the th of Feb I just wanted to let you know and I am looking forward to meeting you Thanks Kim

SMUD Master Natural Gas Purchase AgreementAttached is a sample copy of the Districts Natural Gas Purchase Agreement Master Agreement Enron North America Corp March doc Calvin Miller Master Agreement Enron North America Corp March doc

REThis is true The master agreement would apply only in the event we would be buying gas from Enron on a longterm basis Typically Nova and ANG would have your company assign the capacity to SMUD on their contracts Same with PGT on the capacity release mechanism Calvin Original Message From mailto Sent Thursday March AM To Subject Re Calvin I was thinking last night if we were to come to terms on the pgt capacity sale to you guys and you were willing to prepay it wouldnt matter if we had that master firm gas agreement in place Basically you guys would have the capacity we would get paid upfront and everything wuld be done Kim

REI received your email I did not know that you were sending your Master Agreement Im not sure as to when I will be able to give a new review of this agreement Calvin Original Message From mailto Sent Monday March PM To Subject Calvin Attached is a draft copy of our Master Firm Physical Gas Agreement Please let me know what I can do to help facilitate the process required to get this in place Thanks Kim See attached file SMUDenfoliodraftMardoc
